title: Kevin Hart Interview and More
itunes:title: Kevin Hart Interview and More
description:
1/14/19 - Today on the show we had our guy Kevin Hart stop by where we spoke about his movie "The Upside", culture shifts and during the interview lets just say he owes people a lot of apologies. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to French Montana for his comments about R.Kelly, and we also opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners rules of texting are, after a report went out that stated that 3 messages in a row is looked at as harassment.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
1/14/19 - Today on the show we had our guy Kevin Hart stop by where we spoke about his movie "The Upside", culture shifts and during the interview lets just say he owes people a lot of apologies. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to French Montana for his comments about R.Kelly, and we also opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners rules of texting are, after a report went out that stated that 3 messages in a row is looked at as harassment.
